desc: Socks and Souls is a one for one sock club. We have awesome monthly sock boxes that provide our customers with amazing socks! We are THE sock club!

layout.text: We Have Just The Socks For You
Bonus: for every pair of socks we sell - we donate an additional pair to someone in need.
HELP US HELP OTHERS (AND LOOK GREAT DOING IT)
This month we are donating to Helping Hands Caring Hearts!
